snippet: If weak state economies keep getting better -- which is not at all certain -- Republicans could be hurt in November.
abstract: If weak state economies keep getting better -- which is not at all certain -- Republicans could be hurt in November.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Avent has an eye-opening post on The Economist's Free Exchange blog, noting that the economy is improving more rapidly in swing states than in the rest of the country.

headline.main: Swing State Economies: Weak but Improving
